website_summaries.verdict: A versatile set of gift bags that includes a wide variety of sizes, prints, and colors. A great option to keep on hand for all occasions or for keeping gifts separate for easy identification.
pros: Natural look with unique prints stand out from the crowd and allow the bags to be used for storage or organizational purposes later on
Durable enough for years of use
Each bag comes in 3 different sizes, ranging from small to medium
cons: A handful of owners felt that even the largest size wasn't quite big enough

customer_reviews.title: Super cute gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some alternatives to wrapping paper for Christmas and birthday presents. I think the bags have cute designs, came with little gift tags and string. The fabric is thick enough to obscure what's in the bag. I feel like the smallest bags are a little hard to find a use for (gift cards, candy)? I can see how they would be nice goodie bags, but that's not what I was planning to use them for. Maybe I'll have to just find a use for them around the house instead of as gift bags. But for giving friends and family presents, I would prefer a larger array of bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I've received several compliments about these bags
customer_reviews.text: I needed small gift bags for some "thinking of you" gifts I got for several friends and relatives during this "stay at home" time. They're small spray bottles of lavender and/or lemon hand sanitizer. These adorable bags (I chose the pineapple design) were the perfect size and everyone loved them! They come with gift tags on which I wrote "Stay safe". I wrapped the hand sanitizer in pink tissue and placed it the drawstring bag. So cute! I would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: CarolB

customer_reviews.title: Great for Smaller Gifts
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great for smaller gifts. The largest bag is not very large so if you're looking to wrap anything bigger than a large book I'd look elsewhere. Otherwise for the smaller gifts these bags are great. I used them at Christmas but they really can be used for gift giving year round.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, small, but good value
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected - although I noted the measurements before purchasing, my perception of the size was larger than reality. My own fault! When flat, the largest bag is slightly larger than 1 1/2 pieces of standard copy paper. When opened, of course it will spread out, so for perspective, you could stuff one standard adult-sized sweater into it. The bags are well made and very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Goodie Bags
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable! Made the perfect goodie bag for bridal shower party favors. They are a great size- I was able to fit a small tube of sunscreen, hand sanitizer, scrunchie & small decorative soaps with plenty of room for more. The bags are great quality, thick & durable. The tags they came with were a huge bonus & added a nice touch. I had leftovers and my boyfriend used one to keep his sunglasses & surf tools in. I’ve also used a few as little gift bags and friends always love them. I will definitely be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: shannon oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. For interfamily use, they are reusable from one holiday to the next, easier to store than wrapping paper, and less mess. I wish they came in bigger sizes & a wider assortment of patterns because I would certainly buy them. For out of family gifts, the bag is impressive, sturdy, and just as cool as the gift.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cogswell

customer_reviews.title: Cute and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, trendy, high quality bags. The added gift tags with string are the perfect touch. These bags were perfect treat bags to promote my profession in the workplace. They are large enough that I was able to include a 4x6 cardstock card, a 5x6 note pad, a pen and at least a doze candy treats (mints and chocolates); I would buy again from this seller because I know now that the product is not only adorable, but great quality.
customer_reviews.author: SDSLP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy bags! Great for gifting or for yourself!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are beautiful and well made😊💜. They are bigger than I thought, that is good for gift giving! Even my Husband noticed how nice they are! I bought these to attach to a Mason jar for Coins for laundry $ for a couple of people, think they might be too big, but still going to use 2 of them for that! Look and feel sturdy and stitching and pattern is beautiful! Nice quality, price is fair for the quality you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: True to size and description ❗️
customer_reviews.text: I am a great grandma and I knit :-)... So I am using these bags to better present the items that I have created when I give them to my family and friends ❣️ I was very pleased when I received them... They are of good quality and they add a touch of TLC to my gifts ..thank you thank you 😊 🙏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Dissatisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, durable, and earth friendly
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and perfect! I love that my gift receivers can use these again for their next gift giving experience and skip the single-use paper and tape. My daughter will be getting all her gifts in these for years to come!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Eco-Friendly and Cost-Effective solution for gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that I would never have gift bags on hand and was wasting so much money going out at the last minute to buy gift bags. The gift bags would be expensive and just thrown away .. and it felt super wasteful. This is the perfect eco-friendly and cost-effective replacement for gift bags. This is the most fantastic solution. Everyone has complimented the cute patterns and they love that this is reusable. I've used it to gift a variety of goods and love that they come with tags also. I've already recommended to many of my friends and will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Chen

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for all kinds of things besides gift bags.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was a thick durable quality and the prints were cute. I use them when I take my hot rollers out of my hair in the car in the mornings to keep my pins and rollers contained to carry back in the house later. I also use them i my suitcase when I travel to hold all kinds of things. And of course they make nice reusable gift bags.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Mostly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the bags and product looks as expected based on the pictures online. I would much rather give a gift in a reusable bag, it’s cute easily portable and becomes part of the present as the recipient can keep the bag. My only complaint as the bags do have an odor. I’m assuming it’s the dye or the material. It’s not horribly strong but I may try to wash the bags before using. Especially if you are gifting food chocolates etc.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great gift giving bags.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, have started giving birthday presents in them and the receivers are excited to reuse the bags for gift giving as well. I will purchase these again and again. Would love the seller to include one more bag of each design that is even bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bag because I wanted to reduce the use of gift wrap paper. My purpose is to mostly use them for gifts given in our household, such as for birthdays, father’s and mother’s day, etc. Keep them and reuse them. They are sturdy and come in a variety of sizes. I have used hem a couple times now and I love it! No paper mess, saves the environment and no need to rush to get last minute wrapping paper or tape.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bauza

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and useful!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are a wonderful alternative to wrapping paper for gifts at any time of the year. They are so beautiful they are a gift unto themselves! Everyone loves them. They wash and dry well, are beautifully sewn, and come in fun patterns which remain vivid after washing. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: O. Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and perfect for goody bags!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size gift bag for my daughter’s lemon themed party. She chose all yellow party favors (candy, sunglasses, beach balls, etc.), and everything fit perfectly in these little cloth bags. The paper name tags were a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: sarahm80

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags. I used the small ones for treat bags. The medium size was perfect for creating travel kits with hand sanitizer, wipes, seat covers, disposable placemats, gloves and masks. I would highly recommend them and will probably buy more. Oh and by the way I washed them in the washing machine and they did not fade or shrink.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I had to take the time to write and let you know these bags are great quality, great value and adorable! Purchased them as a small business owner to put travel size products in for my clients; I know they will be reused perfect for sunglasses or jewelry!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hornberger

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Wrapping!
customer_reviews.text: These just came in and I've wrapped Christmas presents in them. I love how quickly and easily wrapping happened with these, not to mention the zero-waste benefit of using a reusable canvas bag over standard wrapping paper. Highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: These bags were a hit this past Christmas! I live that people can easily reuse them and they will get lots of use. The patterns are great and can be given or used for any occasion. I love the gift tags included as well
customer_reviews.author: Coral13

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful earth friendly gift bags
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a nontoxic earth friendly bag to use as goodie bags for my son's 1st birthday party. This was such a great surprise when they came because they are beautiful, well made, and durable. They are also the only gift bags I will be using going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Lee-Ann J

customer_reviews.title: Laundry bags, but good for gifts
customer_reviews.text: These are simply draw-string laundry bags but with nice prints on the materials. They worked very well as reusable gift bags this holiday season and I hope to be able to use them for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Murph

customer_reviews.title: Excellent alternative to the paper gift bags
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gift bags; variety of sizes that include gift tags! I had order a second set to have on hands and to use instead of disposable ones.
customer_reviews.author: VictoriainHMB

customer_reviews.title: I can customize my messages!
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice that this product includes gift cards to write your personal messages. There is more than enough space to write something creative. Really cool, specially for the kids. The bags are made of good quality materials. It looks pretty fancy. I'm so happy! Thank you for providing all these sizes!
customer_reviews.author: taliaba

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Outstanding product. I am a terrible package wrapper and these were a big help. I will definitely order again. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Stults

customer_reviews.title: The bag sizes really do work for presents
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that the sizes wouldn’t work for presents; in fact, I fit all my presents in these bags! I wanted to use reusable bags vs. throwing away wrapping parapet. Looked great under the tree and look brand new still. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Laura Nevill

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely durable bags. They look just like the photos. I use them for Christmas gifts and for small toy storage, and they do the job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, sturdy, and handy
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous! Incredibly sturdy and durable. I’m terrible at wrapping presents so I got these for the holidays and am super excited to use them! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PGJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great color patterns and the best is that they are reusable!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this goodie bags... I used them for the giveaway favors of my daughter's birthday party. Kids were of course all into the bag's contents, but all mommies kept the bags for them. The following day I had some visitors at home and I used them to give some candy... these bags can be used in so many ways that I kept about a dozen for future usage. The quality is awesome and I love natural / non plastic touch that they gave to my event.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Wong

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These little bags are fantastic! Great quality, very sturdy. Beautiful print and colors (I got the pineapple print and loved them.) The size is also perfect for a variety of gifties. Exactly what I was looking for and even included a tag which I needed to keep all my presents straight. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I've been eliminating so much plastic and waste, so was super happy to find these bags. Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Reinke

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were PERFECT!!!! They were exactly what I needed and everyone loved them!! I do wish they had a bigger size so I could get that as well for some of the other things I use them for!!! I love them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: StefanieT3

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags for gifting! Three sizes in all and very sturdy. This will be my new normal for gifting!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Voss

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: These bags are colorful, sturdy and of good quality. I had bought reusable gift bags from other sellers and been disappointed, but these are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! I used the big bags for party favors at a 40th bday and they were a hit!
customer_reviews.author: MRA

customer_reviews.title: Thicker bags.
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality. Wish they came in larger size. I spilt tea on one and washed it. Held up! Thicker than I expected, not see through. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Pixter

customer_reviews.title: Cute reusable bag option!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! They aren’t big enough to hold larger gifts but they a just as advertised size and print wise. I’m surprised there aren’t more options out there like this. I’ll probably but another set :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for goodie bags for my daughter’s birthday and they are awesome! The color is gorgeous (sunflower yellow) and the quality great! Might buy more for snacks and around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations! Very good quality and cute patterns. My only note would be ... they aren’t really Christmas themed.
customer_reviews.author: Azheaven

customer_reviews.title: Good buy! Cute and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great pieces for give away, great quality And the price is excellent!! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Clark

customer_reviews.title: Gift Bags terrific
customer_reviews.text: Unique is the only word that describes your product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my party favors! Great quality too!
customer_reviews.author: nikkoe

customer_reviews.title: Great eco friendly alternative to gift wrapping
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, great waste free option for gift wrapping!!
customer_reviews.author: jazz

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: This year I decided to go green during the holidays and packed all my presents the gifts bags like that. Great idea. Everyone can reuse them for other purposes or next year for Christmas. Reduces waist and all presents looked amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Korba

customer_reviews.title: Well done!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice. I bought them for gifting hand knits, but I'm kinda tempted to just keep them all as knitting project bags!
customer_reviews.author: Alix

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, reusable bags. I used them for Xmas gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: debra b.

customer_reviews.title: great quality!
customer_reviews.text: im very happy with this purchase and will be buying more, good quality and so worth it for the price i paid!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful yellow- not quite mustard not quite sunshine
customer_reviews.text: Great reusable product. Like a small gift itself. Vibrant color
customer_reviews.author: Ay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I cannot emphasize enough how much I LOVE these bags. I’ve been looking for reusable gift bags for a while now and these are it!! The pink pineapple is the cutest! I will definitely be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Alida W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These were used in my classroom for holding gems for counting. Well made and very sturdy/heavy material. I loved them and so did the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Driscall

customer_reviews.title: Great company with great products!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful designs! I couldn't decide on just one so I bought all 3 packages. Very well made and thicker than any canvas type bags I've come across. BEST bang for your buck. Plus, their business values will keep me a repeat customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Milenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: I hate using gift bags . But these are cute, well made a totally reusable in many ways!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect gift bags, you c as n fit so much in them
customer_reviews.author: Link_NinjaTofu

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, high quality cloth bags, even nicer than expected, especially a great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive quality. Great designs and different sizes.
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING good gift for parties/events. I bought some sets for a family party and everyone loved the reusable giftbags. Impressed with the quality. I hope there will he more designs/colors in the future. Great there are different sizes!
customer_reviews.author: quinten suvee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: The bags arrived fast, they are so beautiful, and made with excellent quality! I contacted the seller with a question and they answered within 1 hour, very helpful and super friendly! I would buy again! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! The material is very nice, the designs are exactly like what you see in the picture and I know I'll be using and re-using them for a long time. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Torri M. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bags
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect!! The bags are re-usable, sturdy, and so cute! I get so many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a quality gift bag This was just what I needed and found them for great price. The bags are well made and look great. Plus they are reusable and come with 15 gift cards. Everything arrived on time and intact. great value, I would recommend and purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Daniela Melo

customer_reviews.title: Wrapping Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I have some upcoming birthdays, but there is no time to wrap. So this is perfect for me. I also love the fact that I can personalize my message. I will definitely buy again for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Yates

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! Very cute and good quality. Great alternative to single use gift bags.
customer_reviews.author: britni

customer_reviews.title: Must
customer_reviews.text: These are great for everyday use but also as gift bags. Love that they are reusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Environmental friendly bags
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality/stitching - well made and will be able to use again and again
customer_reviews.author: Wayne W

customer_reviews.title: Classy high-quality gift bags
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric and designs, fast shipping, good selection of sizes
customer_reviews.author: jordan d lipton

customer_reviews.title: canvas bag - pink pineapple
customer_reviews.text: excellent - beyond my expectation and they are so cute and sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bugarin

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift bag.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for christmas!!! So cute, different and most important: Eco-friendly and reusable. The sizes are perfect and the desings really cute. I’m excited to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Marcela Peraza

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Came as shown/expected EXCEPT mine did not include said gift tags....
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good colors and good assortment
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent assortment of gift bags. We have used some already and they were great.

product_meta.title: Erimova - Drawstring Gift Bags + Bonus Gift Tags & String! Canvas Bags with Drawstring. Birthday gift bags. Weddings Baby shower Arts Craft. S - M - Large gift bags. Reusable Bags.
product_meta.description:
GIVE A GIFT AND ALSO REUSE, REDUCE & RECYCLE!

 Make a lasting impression by presenting your products or gifts in cheerful, reusable drawstring cloth bags by Erimova!

 Say no to plastic and paper wrapping and next time use these original designed eco-friendly drawstring bags.

 MULTIPURPOSE CANVAS DRAWSTRING BAGS!

 Diversified usage for travel, toy storage, beauty accessories, beach bags, jewelry bags, makeup bag, dry snacks, an all-purpose sack and more. Get creative.


・ These three sizes are perfect for any gift and storing anything. 
・ Give 2 gifts in 1 to your favorite person: your gift and a beautiful, reusable and colorful drawstring pouch. 
・ High-quality seams and materials.  Our manufacturer has more than 10 years of experience providing the most innovative and quality products.


・ The set includes three stunning designs for the whole family: Blue Shades, Virgin Beige, Pink Pineapples, Color Mosaic. 
・ Homemade bags available in three sizes per pattern to complete 12 pieces set: small (7.4 x 5.5 inches), medium (10.6 x 8.2 inches) and large (14.1 x 12.2 inches) **Due to the nature of our product sizes may fluctuate up to 0.20 inches. Large size 0.78 inches. 
・ Don’t worry about making mistakes. Your set of cloth gift bags comes with 3 bonus gift cards for writing anything you want, no default messages. 
・Great use for Birthdays, Weddings, Christmas, Baby Showers, Thanksgiving, Arts and Crafts projects and more. 
・Three sizes are perfect for all gifts: large (clothes, toys), medium (books, candles) or small (jewelry, gift cards)! Help the environment, reduce your footprint this season and get the most complete and stylish set of party favor bags. The bags will last for years!

Amazon buyers trust Erimova’s brand to offer the best quality premium products.

Supplies are limited, buy now!
feature_bullets: 🎁 12 GREAT REUSABLE GIFT BAGS - CANVAS DRAWSTRING BAGS 🎁 Set includes 4 stunning designs in 3 different sizes to complete 12 pcs. Great use as Birthday bags, Weddings, Christmas, Baby Showers, Thanksgiving. Reusable gift bag assortment quality guaranteed!

🔥 GIFT BAGS ASSORTED SIZES 🔥 Get the most complete, colorful, stylish, durable and inexpensive assortment of drawstring gift bags. Three sizes provided: small bags (7.4 x 5.5 inches), medium (10.6 x 8.2 inches) and large (14.1 x 12.2 inches).

⭐ MULTIPURPOSE DRAWSTRING GIFT BAG ⭐ Diversified usage for travel, toy storage, beauty accessories, beach bags, jewelry bags, makeup bag, dry snacks, etc. The drawstring closure provides easy access and a convenient way to carry. Wrap your gifts in seconds!
🌎 SAY NO TO PLASTIC BAGS 🌎 Reduce the gift wrap bags waste. These fabric bags are made with smooth and delicate fabric, which allows for air circulation.
✍ 15 REMOVABLE TAGS ✍ Don’t worry about making mistakes. Your set of cloth bags - drawstring pouch comes with 3 bonus gift cards for writing anything you want, no default messages!
